titleStmt.title: A sermon before the societies for reformation of manners in Dublin preached in New-Row, April the 26th, 1698 / by Nath. Weld.
titleStmt.author: Weld, Nathaniel, d. 1731.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook for Eliphal Dobson,

notesStmt.note: "Published at the desire of the said societies."
